00021 #include <string>

00023 #include "DataException.h"
00024 #include "DataSetTest_DATGridSet.h"
00025 #include "GenericData.h"
00026 #include "GenericDataTypes.h"
00027 #include "GenericFileReader.h"
00028 
00029 using namespace std;
00030 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00031 
00032 #define TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE_WITH_GRIDS "../data/test.file.data_dat_with_grid"
00033 
00034 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetTest_DATGridSet );
00035 
00036 DataSetTest_DATGridSet::DataSetTest_DATGridSet()
00037 {
00038         data = 0;
00039         dataPlane = 0;
00040 }
00041 
00042 DataSetTest_DATGridSet::~DataSetTest_DATGridSet()
00043 {
00044 
00045 }
00046 
00047 void DataSetTest_DATGridSet::setUp()
00048 {
00049         data = new GenericData;
00050         GenericFileReader reader;
00051         std::string name = TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE_WITH_GRIDS;
00052         reader.SetFilename(name);
00053         reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00054         try
00055         {
00056                 dataPlane = data->DataSet(0,1); // grids is the second DataSet of the first DataGroup.
00057         }
00058         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00059         {
00060                 dataPlane = 0;
00061         }
00062 }
00063 
00064 void DataSetTest_DATGridSet::tearDown()
00065 {
00066         if (dataPlane)
00067                 dataPlane->Delete();
00068         delete data;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void DataSetTest_DATGridSet::testCreation()
00072 {
00073         // Check that the DataSet was created.
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00075 }
00076 
00077 void DataSetTest_DATGridSet::testSingleElementAccess()
00078 {
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00080 
00081         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00082         int32_t cols = dataPlane->Cols();
00083         for (int32_t row = 0; row < rows; ++row)
00084         {
00085                 for (int32_t col = 0; col < cols; ++col)
00086                 {
00087                         // Compute the expected value
00088                         float expected = (float)(row*100 + col/2); // corner = col/2
00089 
00090                         float value;
00091                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(row, col, value));
00092                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == expected);
00093                 }
00094         }
00095 
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00097 
00098 }
